title: Beautifully Updated 2 bed! Granite Countertops!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post

Call Craig Persin with Apartment Guys at 773-343-7745 and ask for reference #2201616.This lovely two bedroom is located in the heart of Edgewater and is newly updated with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floors and the building has a fitness center, bike storage and on site parking.
***Photos may be of a similar unit.****For faster response best to call or text Craig Persin at 773-343-7745 with reference #2201616
